content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Mister Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite satisfactory. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the confidence, Mister Schmidt. Considering the apartment's size and location, I believe 500 Euros per month would be a fair price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Mister Wang, but 500 Euros is too low for this prime location. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the value of the property. How about 650 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 650 Euros is too high for me, Mister Schmidt. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I believe 550 Euros per month would be more appropriate.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Mister Wang, I'm not interested in negotiating with you. I'm willing to rent out my apartment for 650 Euros per month. If you're not willing to pay that amount, I'd rather find a tenant who appreciates the value of this property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are not willing to meet my price. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
